# makeCommandAllocator()

**Instance Method**

Creates a new command allocator.

## Declaration

```swift
func makeCommandAllocator() -> (any MTL4CommandAllocator)?
```

## Return Value

A [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4CommandAllocator] instance, or `nil` if the function failed.
title: makeCommandAllocator()
